lead_paragraph: BEIJING — For all the pressure on Yao Ming during the Olympics, not even the most rabid Chinese basketball fan expects the Chinese team to win a medal. Yao himself had set a goal of reaching the final six as a kind of progress report for the state of basketball in a country crazed about the game.
